metadata.title: CVE-2019-11027 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Ruby OpenID (aka ruby-openid) through 2.8.0 has a remotely exploitableflaw. This library is used by Rails web applications to integrate withOpenID Providers. Severity can range from medium to critical, depending onhow a web application developer chose to employ the ruby-openid library.Developers who based their OpenID integration heavily on the "example app"provided by the project are at highest risk.

criterions.comment: ruby-openid: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
